# Embed AI Model Tracker

Share the AI Model Tracker badge on your website, blog, or repository.

## Markdown Badge

Add to your README or documentation:

```markdown
[![AI Model Tracker](https://img.shields.io/badge/AI_Models-60%2B_Tracked-4f46e5?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://dfbustosus.github.io/ai-model-tracker/)
```

**Preview:**

[![AI Model Tracker](https://img.shields.io/badge/AI_Models-60%2B_Tracked-4f46e5?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://dfbustosus.github.io/ai-model-tracker/)

---

## HTML Badge

For websites or HTML documentation:

```html
<a href="https://dfbustosus.github.io/ai-model-tracker/" target="_blank">
  <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/AI_Models-60%2B_Tracked-4f46e5?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64," alt="AI Model Tracker - 60+ models tracked">
</a>
```

---

## Comparison Widget (Iframe Embed)

Embed the full comparison tool on your site:

```html
<iframe
  src="https://dfbustosus.github.io/ai-model-tracker/#compare"
  width="100%"
  height="600px"
  frameborder="0"
  title="AI Model Comparison Tool"
></iframe>
```

## Attribution

If you use this data or tool in research, please cite:

```bibtex
@misc{ai-model-tracker-2026,
  author = {David Bustos},
  title = {AI Model Tracker: The Complete 2025-2026 Landscape},
  year = {2026},
  publisher = {GitHub},
  journal = {GitHub repository},
  howpublished = {\url{https://github.com/dfbustosus/ai-model-tracker}}
}
```
